## Tessellator type

Tessellation function. Receives a point array representing a polygon / cell and yields an array of point arrays, representing the subdivided cells.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type Tessellator = (points: ReadonlyVec[]) => Vec[][];
```
